summary: Competing radio personalities in Chicago find common ground when they have to work together.
cast: Alison Sweeney|Jonathan Scarfe|Crystal Balint|David Lewis|Vincent Gale|Darla Taylor|Nicole Oliver|Jason Edward Coleman|John Kapelos|Thomas Cadrot|David MacKay|Lindsay Maxwell|Rebekah Asselstine|Farrah Aviva|Sienna Bohn|Emily Maddison|Greg Rogers|Matthew Graham|Kirby Morrow|Robert Heimbecker|Jessa Danielson|Jan Bos
title: Amor en las ondas
